text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Whoosh...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's been three days since I was left<n>on this deserted island.
What little<n>provisions I brought along have long<n>since run
out, and sadly, my phone still<n>shows no signal.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Some break this turned out to be. Inever should've signed up for thatisland tour. Or at the very least, Ishould've memorized when the returnboat was leaving.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But I can't turn back time. This is my<n>reality. I close my
eyes as my heart<n>fills with regret. I'll never be able to<n>help
Umamusume reach their full<n>potential now...
Heeey! You okaaay?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The sound of someone's voice<n>brings me back to this
mortal plane. I<n>don't recognize them, but whoever it<n>is,
their voice is so soothing and<n>warm.

You must've had it pretty rough, huh?<n>Well, you don't have
to worry<n>anymore. Here, drink up. ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The kind stranger helps me sit up and<n>puts a cup to my lips.
This benevolent<n>voice, this sense of security, this<n>strong,
sturdy embrace... Surely, I've<n>come across...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After I finish up the water, those<n>warm hands next bring me
a bowl of<n>miso soup. As I eagerly devour the<n>delicious
soup, my once-hazy<n>consciousness begins to come back.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And it turns out my "goddess" is<n>actually Hishi Akebono.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, look at you gobble it up. I'm<n>glad I brought some
homemade miso<n>soup with me.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
But what a surprise this was. I never<n>thought I'd find a
trainer from school<n>collapsed on the beach.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
I contacted the return ferry by radio<n>just now, so don't
worry. We'll both<n>be back home in no time. ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
This isn't the first time I've seen that<n>friendly smile.
Suddenly, I'm taken<n>back to the recent Tracen Meet,<n>
where students who have yet to<n>debut compete...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Guess what, everybody! As of this<n>morning, I'm officially
over 180<n>centimeters tall!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: WOOOO!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: To celebrate, I'm going to give this<n>race my aaall!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Each racer has entered their gate.<n>The Tracen Meet
1,200-meter turf<n>race... begins!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Akebono just keeps growing<n>more and more. She's
got to be the<n>biggest Umamusume at Tracen now,<n>right?

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
I believe so. And she knows how to<n>use that big body of
hers in races...<n>I've heard lots of trainers have their<n>eyes
on her.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Graaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Passing the finish line by a huge<n>margin, it's Hishi
Akebono! She's<n>taken first place in today's race!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I still remember the way she blew<n>away the competition
with her speed<n>and strength. But... what's she doing<n>
here?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Why, gathering kombu seaweed, silly!<n>I'm buddies with the
old fisherman, so<n>he let me hitch a ride with him.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: You see, the kombu seaweed here isfilled with lots and lots ofminerals, making it perfect for buonodashi stock!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Speaking of food, you must be<n>starving. Why don't I throw<n>
something together for you real<n>quick?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Sure! ☆ I brought my outdoor cooking<n>kit with me after all. ♪
Oh, and I think I<n>have some wild herbs too... I know!<n>Let's
make a seafood hot pot!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Just imagine all those delectable<n>fishies soaking up all that
dashi<n>stock... My tummy's rumbling just<n>thinking about it!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: That settles it. Better get started on<n>the fire! ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Like a master camper, Hishi Akebono<n>sets up her pot in a
flash. She goes to<n>light the fire...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Ow, hot, hot! Ahaha... Starting a fire<n>never gets any easier,
huh... Ah, a<n>crab!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before I know it, she's got a<n>mountain of seafood before
her, which<n>she likewise prepares in the blink of<n>an eye.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Mmm! Now that smells good! Too bad<n>I didn't bring any
udon noodles to sop<n>up the extra broth!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And just like that, before us sits a<n>delicious-looking seafood
hot pot.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: All right, eat up! ☆ I'm sure it tastes<n>extra buono.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, happy to hear it!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I scarf down the hot pot as if in a<n>trance. When I finally look
up from my<n>bowl, I see Hishi Akebono beaming<n>as she
watches me eat.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Is it buono?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe... I can tell from your face. I<n>love watching people
enjoy my food.<n>If only I could find a trainer who<n>
understands that...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
But when I explain that to the ones<n>scouting me, they all
look at me like I<n>have three heads.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: And because of that, I still don't have<n>a trainer...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Ah, wait a minute! What about you?Would you like to be my trainer?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
If you say yes, let's see... I'll make<n>you miso soup eeevery
single day!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Setting aside the miso soup offer...Her run did leave an impressionon me, and I have to admit, she has aunique charm to her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: My mind made up, I nod my head,<n>signalling my approval.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Wow! Really?! Yippee! ♪

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, I'm so glad I came here<n>today. I can't wait to start
training with<n>you!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
I know! To celebrate, how about I<n>make your favorite food?
What would<n>you like? Well? Well?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Charmed by her enthusiasm, I tell her<n>my favorite foods
without a second<n>thought... And just like that, my days<n>
with Hishi Akebono have begun.
